Trade/Device Name(s): Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assay Methamphetamine_3, 4-methylenedioxymethamphetamine (Meth_MDMA)
Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assay for Methamphetamine (Meth) and 3,4-Methylenedioxymethamphetamine (MDMA)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Gas Chromatography/Mass Spectrometry (GC/MS) in SIM mode with deuterated internal standards
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assay using ELISA and microplate reader for qualitative detection of methamphetamine and MDMA in head and body hair
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test for qualitative detection of methamphetamine and MDMA at or above 500 pg/mg in human head and body hair, intended for single laboratory use only; presumptive positives require confirmation by GC/MS.
